Summary: Extremely close encounter. Object filled the sky directly above me.
divs: sighting details1. i was in my car and i was driving. 2. large spot light shining across the sky above the road in front of me. 3. helicopter w\ spot light, which was witnessed in the past in this area. 4. very large. filled the sky above my vehicle, just above the trees. 5. disbelief at first. stopped the vehicle, rolled down the window, looked up and looked around at its features and details. frightening feelings once i realized i was alone. now, a lot of confusion, wonder, but contentment. 6. it continued on its path until out of sight above the trees.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Tawas City
